other_tests.findings: Serum testosterone levels below detection limits; low inhibin B (37 and 199 pg/mL); both gonadotropins undetectable or low (LH undetectable, FSH 0.18 IU/L).
other_tests.changes_over_time: In one boy, testosterone increased to 8.01 nmol/L after hCG stimulation; significant response noted with testosterone treatment for all cases.

other_tests.findings: Undetectable serum levels of FSH and LH both before and after stimulation.
Repetitive measurements of spontaneous serum testosterone levels were undetectable.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Testosterone increased to 3.16 nmol/L after stimulation at 3 years.

other_tests.findings: Undetectable serum testosterone; low FSH, LH, and inhibin B (0.18 IU/L, 0.07 IU/L, and 199 pg/mL, respectively).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Testosterone treatment initiated at 9 months showed significant effect on genital development.
